dcl_constantbuffer cb0[13], immediateIndexed

dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t1
dcl_uav_typed_texture2d (uint,uint,uint,uint) u0
dcl_input vThreadID.xyz
dcl_temps 4
dcl_thread_group 16, 16, 2

// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r3.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw


// WATCH_DOGS2 Screen Space Reflection fix (Compute Shader variant) inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --fix-wd2-screen-space-reflections-cs -i -f --only-autofixed a906dca9a1d70241-cs.txt
itof r0.x, vThreadID.y
ge r0.y, r0.x, cb1[11].y
if_nz r0.y
  ret 
endif 
itof r0.y, vThreadID.x
lt r0.z, cb1[11].x, r0.y
lt r0.w, cb1[11].y, r0.x
or r0.z, r0.w, r0.z
if_nz r0.z
  ret 
endif 
dp2 r0.z, r0.yyyy, cb1[11].zzzz
add r0.z, r0.z, l(-1.000000)
log r0.z, |r0.z|
mul r0.z, r0.z, l(40.000000)
exp r0.z, r0.z
add r1.x, r0.y, l(0.500000)
add r1.y, r0.x, l(0.500000)
mul r0.xy, r1.xyxx, cb1[11].zwzz
mov r1.xy, vThreadID.xyxx
mov r1.zw, l(0,0,0,0)
ldms_indexable(texture2dms)(float,float,float,float) r1.x, r1.xyzw, t0.xyzw, vThreadID.z
mov r1.yzw, l(0,1.000000,0,0)
dp2 r0.w, r1.xyxx, cb0[11].zwzz
dp2 r1.x, r1.xyxx, cb0[12].zwzz
div r0.w, -r0.w, r1.x
ushr r1.xy, vThreadID.xyxx, l(2, 2, 0, 0)
ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r1.x, r1.xyzw, t1.xyzw
min r0.w, r0.w, r1.x
mad r0.xy, cb1[9].xyxx, r0.xyxx, cb1[9].zwzz
mul r1.xy, r0.wwww, r0.xyxx

// WATCH_DOGS2 unprojection fix inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --fix-wd2-screen-space-reflections-cs -i -f --only-autofixed a906dca9a1d70241-cs.txt

add r3.w, r0.w, -r3.y
mul r3.w, r3.w, r3.x
mad r1.x, -r3.w, cb0[9].x, r1.x

mad r0.x, r0.z, l(0.120000), l(1.000000)
mul r1.x, r0.x, r1.x
mov r1.z, -r0.w
mov r1.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r0.x, r1.xyzw, cb1[3].xyzw
lt r0.x, r0.x, cb1[10].w
add r0.y, cb1[0].z, l(-100.000000)
lt r0.y, r0.y, r0.w
or r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
if_nz r0.x
  ret 
endif 
mul r0.x, r0.w, l(65536.000000)
ftou r0.x, r0.x
dp4 r2.x, r1.xyzw, cb1[5].xyzw
dp4 r2.y, r1.xyzw, cb1[6].xyzw
dp4 r0.y, r1.xyzw, cb1[8].xyzw

// SSPRWMirrorViewProjMatrix - subtract stereo correction:
add r3.w, r0.y, -r3.y
mad r2.x, -r3.w, r3.x, r2.x

div r1.xyzw, r2.xyxy, r0.yyyy
mad r1.xyzw, -r1.xyzw, cb1[0].xyxy, cb1[0].xyxy
ftou r1.xyzw, r1.xyzw
iadd r0.y, vThreadID.z, l(-3)
ult r0.w, vThreadID.z, l(2)
movc r2.x, r0.w, vThreadID.z, r0.y
mov r0.y, vThreadID.z
mov r2.y, icb[r0.y + 0].y
iadd r0.yw, r1.zzzw, r2.xxxy
atomic_umin u0, r0.ywyy, r0.x
lt r0.y, l(0.010000), r0.z
if_nz r0.y
  iadd r2.xyzw, r1.zwzw, l(1, 0, -1, 0)
  atomic_umin u0, r2.xyxx, r0.x
  atomic_umin u0, r2.zwzz, r0.x
  iadd r1.xyzw, r1.xyzw, l(0, 1, 0, -1)
  atomic_umin u0, r1.xyxx, r0.x
  atomic_umin u0, r1.zwzz, r0.x
endif 
ret 
// Approximately 69 instruction slots used
